name: 傅斌暉
objective:
應用設計手繪工具與技法於各種設計作品圖面呈現，培養學生對空間、形體、材質、介面、裝置、比例等簡潔繪畫技巧與圖示性設計圖表達能力。
Students will learn to sketch by hand in various tools and technologies on design drawings. The simple painting tips as, spatial perceptive, presentation of form and materials, interfaces media types and installations, and proportion as well as abilities of the infographic design presentation will be taught in this class.
